lead_paragraph: One of the three surviving soccer players pulled from the wreckage of the Colombian air crash that killed 71 people this week is doing well after leg surgery and will play again, his father said.

headline.print_headline: Colombia Crash Survivor Neto Will Play Football Again, Father Says
headline.main: Colombia Crash Survivor Neto Will Play Football Again, Father Says
